title: Best Air Fryer Seafood Recipes
description: The air fryer is a great tool for getting your family to eat more healthy seafood without frying. Here's a varied collection of seafood recipes for the air fryer, featuring salmon, shrimp, scallops, white fish, crab cakes, fish sticks, even lobster recipes.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE 22 Best Air Fryer Seafood Recipes By Carl Hanson Carl Hanson Carl Hanson is a Senior Editor at Allrecipes who has been writing about food and wine for nearly 20 years. He enjoys creating content that informs, entertains, and assists busy home cooks get nourishing meals on the table for their families. Allrecipes' editorial guidelines Updated on July 27, 2021 Close Photo by France C. These days, we're all looking for ways to get a little more seafood into our diets. That's why we love the air fryer. It's a great tool for getting your family to eat more healthy seafood without frying. We've put together a varied collection of seafood recipes for the air fryer, featuring salmon, shrimp, scallops, white fish, crab cakes, fish sticks, even lobster recipes. Give these top-rated seafood recipes a try. 01 of 24 Air Fryer Breaded Sea Scallops View Recipe Save "Lightly breaded sea scallops cooked in the air fryer with the same results as deep frying, but without the nasty smell or mess!" says Kim's Cooking Now. 02 of 24 Air-Fried Crumbed Fish View Recipe Save "Crumbed fish is one of my favorite fried items, and this air-fried version of the recipe gives me great flavor without the fat," says Launa. 03 of 24 Cajun Air Fryer Salmon View Recipe Save Ready in less than 10 minutes! This moist and delicious air-fryer salmon is full of flavor with a Cajun seasoning and a touch of sweetness. France C., the recipe submitter, recommends, for best results, "using center-cut fillets that are about an inch thick." 04 of 24 Air Fryer Crab Cakes View Recipe Save "Air frying crab cakes means less mess and less cleanup, but at no sacrifice to taste," says lutzflcat. "They're flavorful, crisp, and lighter than if cooked with oil in a skillet. Serve with your favorite dipping sauce, aioli, or tartar sauce, as well as fresh lemon wedges." 05 of 24 Keto Air Fryer Salmon Cakes with Sriracha Mayo View Recipe Save Siracha mayo adds a socko of spicy flavor to these quick-and-easy salmon cakes. "Salmon cakes can certainly be keto-friendly if you just tweak a few ingredients," says France C. "They make a great dinner or you can serve atop a salad for a delicious lunch." 06 of 24 Air Fryer Lemon Pepper Shrimp View Recipe Save "These easy-to-make air fryer shrimp can be served with a salad or on top of rice or pasta," says bd.weld. "Also great as a cold appetizer." 07 of 24 Air Fryer Lobster Tails with Lemon-Garlic Butter View Recipe Save Yes, lobster tails cooked in your air fryer! It's a thing. Serve them with a lemon-garlic butter sauce. "Loved this!" raves Soup Loving Nicole. "I will never cook lobster in anything other than an air fryer again!" 08 of 24 Air Fryer Shrimp and Polenta View Recipe Save "Crispy air-fried polenta cakes topped with shrimp, tomatoes, and seasoned butter," Soup Loving Nicole 09 of 24 Air Fryer Cajun Crab Cakes View Recipe Save "This is a small batch recipe making just three crab cakes in an air fryer, but can be doubled easily," says thedailygourmet. "The seasoning is a starting point and can be adjusted as needed." 10 of 24 Air Fryer Crab Rangoon View Recipe Save "Super crispy exterior with warm and fluffy pillow centers is what you'll get with this air fryer crab rangoon recipe," says Soup Loving Nicole. "Serve with sweet chili sauce for dipping, if desired." 11 of 24 Air Fryer Shrimp a la Bang Bang View Recipe Save "This is my take on a popular dish from a restaurant chain," says Soup Loving Nicole. "My version is made in an air fryer instead of being deep-fried. The end result was perfectly crispy sweet and spicy shrimp." 12 of 24 Air Fryer Salmon Nuggets View Recipe Save "Crispy on the outside, moist and tender on the inside, these salmon nuggets are finished off with a sweet chipotle-maple drizzle," says France C. "These make a great appetizer and are also tasty served over greens." 13 of 24 Air Fryer Fish Sticks View Recipe Save "Homemade fish sticks that are perfectly crisp on the outside, tender and flaky on the inside," says Soup Loving Nicole. "This was my first attempt at making them in an air fryer, and the results were quite impressive. Dip in tarter or cocktail sauce." 14 of 24 Panko-Crusted Air Fryer Mahi Mahi View Recipe Save thedailygourmet "This delicious air fryer mahi mahi with panko breading has a satisfying crunch while the fish fillets turn out perfectly flaky," says thedailygourmet. "Serve with a side of rice or use the fillets for fish tacos." 15 of 24 Air-Fried Crispy Fish Po' Boys with Chipotle Slaw View Recipe Save Crispy air-fried white fish are topped with chipotle coleslaw and served on toasted hoagie rolls. "These turned out great," raves Soup Loving Nicole. "The chipotle and cilantro in the slaw was a nice change. Bonus is that the leftover fish stayed crispy in the fridge overnight, which is something you will not get with a deep fry." 16 of 24 Air Fryer Shrimp "Boil" View Recipe Save "All the flavors you love in a shrimp boil in a fraction of the time and with a lot less mess," says Soup Loving Nicole. "No need to wait for a pot of water to boil just to stand over it making sure it doesn't boil over. Air fryer to the rescue! While this is a less messy version, the way I chose to cut the corn still lets you dig in and get your hands messy for that authentic touch. The cob creates a perfect handle for holding while the kernels face upright for easy access." 17 of 24 Air Fryer Shrimp View Recipe Save "Fish fry seasoning, egg, and a spritz of oil are all you need to make these tasty, crispy air fryer shrimp!" says France C. "Use your favorite brand of fish fry breading mix. Serve with cocktail sauce, lemon-garlic aioli, or whatever you prefer!" 18 of 24 Air Fryer Mahi Mahi with Brown Butter View Recipe Save Soup Loving Nicole "This is a super simple but super tasty fish dish," says FrackFamily5. "You'll want to check your fish halfway through to gauge how much more time you'll need to keep cooking, depending on the thickness of your fish." 19 of 24 Air Fryer Coconut Shrimp View Recipe Save "Coconut shrimp come out great in the air fryer, and are served with a simple spicy honey-lime dip," says SUSUMILLER. 20 of 24 Air Fryer Spicy Bay Scallops View Recipe Save Ready in about 15 minutes. "These spicy scallops are good on their own or can be served in lettuce wraps, tacos, salads, served over rice or pasta," says Soup Loving Nicole. "Serve with lemon wedges if desired." 21 of 24 Air-Fried Shrimp Fajitas View Recipe Save These quick shrimp fajitas don't require the typical liquid marinade. "You can use your preferred fajita seasoning and serve with toppings of your choice, like sour cream, Oaxaca cheese, and avocado," says thedailygourmet. 22 of 24 Seasoned Crunchy Cod Fillets in the Air Fryer View Recipe Save Bibi These crunchy fillets will be ready in less than 25 minutes. "The air fryer does a great job on fish, and the topping on these cod fillets is tasty and crunchy," says Bibi. "Use the fillets as a main dish with some rice and veggies, or as a sandwich filling, with lettuce, tomato, and remoulade, or your favorite sandwich spread." 23 of 24 More Dinners from the Air Fryer Photo by Buckwheat Queen. Our Best Air Fryer Dinner Recipes The Best Air Fryer Salmon Recipes More Air Fryer Main Dish Recipes 24 of 24 Which Air Fryers Are Best? Rachel Johnson We tested 8 air fryers so you don't have to! Find out which air fryers came out on top in our roundup of The Best Air Fryers, Tested By Allrecipes. Explore more: Recipes Everyday Cooking Cooking by Equipment Air Fryer Was this page helpful? Thanks for your feedback! Tell us why! Other Submit You’ll Also Love Crispy Air Fryer Cod 8 Ratings Air Fryer Salmon Cakes 3 Ratings Easy Air Fryer Glazed Salmon 1 Rating Frozen Shrimp in the Air Fryer 3 Ratings Air Fryer Breaded Sea Scallops 17 Ratings Air Fryer Salmon Burgers 1 Rating Tartar Sauce-Battered Fish Sticks in the Air Fryer 6 Ratings Air Fryer Shrimp "Boil" 9 Ratings Air Fryer Crab Cakes 3 Ratings Keto Air Fryer Salmon Cakes with Sriracha Mayo 10 Ratings Air Fryer Butterflied Shrimp 7 Ratings Air Fryer Maple-Miso Salmon 1 Rating TikTok's Air Fryer Shrimp 3 Ratings Seasoned Crunchy Cod Fillets in the Air Fryer 2 Ratings Air-Fried Frozen Salmon 2 Ratings Air Fryer Salmon and Asparagus for One 7 Ratings Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family.
